item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and events in Providence.

This week's location is: The Hot Club on S. Water St. (this is the area with a few bars across from Narragansett Electric and in front of the hurricane barrier on the water.)

It's that time of year again and we're going to the THE HOT CLUB!!!

Okay, so it's a notorious Providence institution, it's the end of Memorial Day Weekend.....AND it's become a Providence Collective tradition, but what better way to spend the end of a (hopefully) glorious, beautiful, sunny summer kick-off weekend than winding down and hanging out with friends on the deck overlooking the water and the Providence skyline!

Its official, we've done this 5 YEARS in a row and its worth repeating, so let's check it out!

Hopefully we'll score a table(s) outside on the deck in the back - look for us!!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels the Monday Night Meetup. Ever. Except Hurricane Sandy and NYE 2012.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf, jacket or headband, but we're hard to miss - look for us on the outside deck if it's warm!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - The Hot Club! (It's tradition!)
